title: FirmWars
author: FirmWars
content: I just find out that some new comers are calling Bitcoin volatility a flaw, like really? This is the converstion among my friends, no wonder no one wants to always buy when there is panic in the market.Something that should be their strength is becoming their fear. Its volatility comes with an advantage, aka the buying power or buying opportunity.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on March 17, 2025, 08:50:03 AMI just find out that some new comers are calling Bitcoin volatility a flaw, like really? This is the converstion among my friends, no wonder no one wants to always buy when there is panic in the market.People who do not understand bitcoin well will tell you that its volatility is a flaw. Volatility is indeed a risk but we can work to make it into our advantage. We can use this volatility to earn profit, but people are too scared of this volatility because they think that anytime bitcoin will crash and it will be completely devalued.

Over they years, Bitcoin keeps bouncing back and I've seen holding tight through the crazy times pays off big.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on March 17, 2025, 08:50:03 AMIts volatility comes with an advantage, aka the buying power or buying opportunity. Not only for buyers but sellers too because volatility is movement of price up or down, so those hodlers who have hit their target would sell when the price has appreciated and wait to buy when it has dropped reasonably or to their own target of DCA. Also for the traders who do spot, they also benefit from the volatility. It is normal for a newbie to feel that way because they are yet to understand it. It is fear and understanding process that some of us felt too as new comers. If you are not an online investment inclined then it will take longer time to understand what volatility is.

I really disagree if you think that all traders who use Spot trading will get profit in this Bitcoin volatile market.People don't need to use Margin or Futures trading type to be panic in this volatile market.Psychology of market cycles.

comments.author: Nothingtodo
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on March 17, 2025, 08:50:03 AMIts volatility comes with an advantage, aka the buying power or buying opportunity. Volatility may present an opportunity in the Bitcoin market, especially for those who have not invested in Bitcoin, as there is an opportunity to make new investments. Or for those who have invested at high prices in the past, now there is an opportunity to invest at low prices so that they can make an average profit.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Well they misunderstood that volatility isn’t a flaw but a feature. Without it Bitcoin wouldn’t create life-changing opportunities for many early adopters. Sure they’re afraid of the dips but that’s exactly where smart money buys in. The market rewards those who stay patient and think long-term not those who panic. Volatility fuels the gains just as much as the drops.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on March 17, 2025, 08:50:03 AMI just find out that some new comers are calling Bitcoin volatility a flaw, like really? This is the converstion among my friends, no wonder no one wants to always buy when there is panic in the market.Something that should be their strength is becoming their fear. Its volatility comes with an advantage, aka the buying power or buying opportunity. They are not wrong. BTC's volatility is indeed a flaw and that is what makes it risky. A lot of investors cannot manage risks. Instead of lying to themselves that they can handle it, it is good that they admit they cannot deal with Bitcoin's volatility. It should not surprise you that even among us here, there are still people lying to themselves. They don't want Bitcoin's price to ever dip; they panic whenever this happens and don't even consider using the opportunity to buy more Bitcoin while waiting for the price to appreciate again.Real Bitcoiners know how to seize every opportunity to their advantage. To those newcomers who think volatility is a flaw, they are right, and there is no need to impose our views on them. We can manage risks by implementing the right strategies, but they can't and they don't care.
